name: Zoo Skyland-Survive in bullets
description:
Shoot to defeat all monsters, rescue your family members and renovate sweet home! Slide to change the direction of shooting and evade attack, find a proper time to release the skill.

Select your very own costume and cool weapons. Take an elf during the fight, their unique skill will surprise you! Since the home was taken and damaged, let’s fight against all monsters to get her back!

Game Features
▶ Unique gameplay: Defeat monster to rescue friends，collect Stars to renovate your home.
▶ Exciting shoot levels: tons of fun, featuring unique monster
▶ Fantastic characters: all the characters are equipped with great skills
▶ Special elf: with 7 cute elves, with endless fun 

Show off your skills, defeat monsters, be a hero in this fancy adventure! Download Zoo Skyland for free!
